info.author: Ian Flitman
info.title: Jane
info.description: Jane is a dialogue-based narrative network for two actors. Jake and John talk about their wives and a woman they share called Jane. They have six conversations that are divided into three sections each. The dialogue is written with numerous line alternatives throughout. All line combinations are equally valid creating differing portraits of the men and the figure of Jane.

section.summary: John watched a film on TV last night.

cut.speaker: Jake
cut.line: What did you do last night?
cut.name: what_do

cut.speaker: John
cut.line: Saw a film. On TV it was. Did you see it?
cut.name: saw_film

option.line: Out of Africa.
option.name: africa

option.line: 28 Days Later.
Donnie Darko.
option.name: darko

option.line: Octopussy.
option.name: octo

option.line: Armageddon.
option.name: armageddon

option.line: A Moon for the Misbegotten.
option.name: misbegotten

option.line: Basic Instinct.
option.name: basic

option.line: The Unbearable Lightness of Being.
option.name: unbearable

option.line: Seen it already.
option.name: seen_already

option.line: No, I was busy last night.
option.name: busy

option.line: Yes, Jill stormed out in protest.
option.name: protest

option.line: A filmic orgasm, it was.
option.name: orgasm

option.line: No, I was just trying to make conversation.
option.name: making conversation

option.line: I took my life out of hands for a while.
option.name: life_out

option.line: I can't. I know I oppress myself with stories.
option.name: oppress_stories

option.line: The adverts made it a living torment.
option.name: torment

option.line: Nothing as boring as a film you've seen before.
option.name: boring_seen

option.line: Nothing like an old film for a bit of narrative nostalgia.
option.name: nostalgia

option.line: Married to a woman you can't stay in the same room with. How did that happen?
option.name: same_room

option.line: And you don't even care where she goes. How did that happen?
option.name: not_care

option.line: Sex in films, it makes me squirm.
option.name: film_sex

option.line: Ah, the pleasure of looking at other people's lives. Like the Gods, we are.
option.name: like_gods

option.line: Me and Jill, we don't talk about films anymore. Is that the beginning of the end?
option.name: beginning_end

option.line: Are shadows on the wall the only thing we can share?
option.name: wall_shadows

option.line: And when it ends you get a gravity attack.
option.name: gravity_attack

option.line: My life needs no substitute, John.
option.name: substitute

option.line: There's no escaping them, no matter how hard you try.
option.name: no_escape

option.line: No choice when other people's lives are so much more interesting than you own.
option.name: more_interesting

option.line: Ah, the comfort of the banal.
option.name: banal_comfort

option.line: Our stories, our lives. Just alibis for purchasing, nothing more.
option.name: alibis

option.line: I hate it when you remember the ending halfway through.
option.name: remember_ending

option.line: I usually feel I've seen it all before even when I haven't.
option.name: seen before

option.line: I avoid them like the plague. They never change and we always do.
option.name: plague

option.line: And no surprises just like life should always be.
option.name: no_surprises

cut.speaker: John
cut.line: I fell asleep before the end. But I dreamt the end anyway.
cut.name: dreamt_end

section.summary: John makes up different endings to the film he watched.

cut.speaker: Jake
cut.line: So tell me what happens in the filmic fantasy inside your head?
cut.name: filmic

option.line: Africa turns cannibal.
option.name: cannibal

option.line: The world got full of zombies.
option.name: zombies

option.line: The rabbit starts to follow me but gets bored and leaves me alone.
option.name: rabbit_follow

option.line: James Bond kills himself.
option.name: bond

option.line: The world dies with the word 'Mother' on the lips of a little girl.
option.name: little_girl

option.line: The moon deserts us. It leaves us alone. The sea swallows us whole.
option.name: swallows_whole

option.line: All the things my wife simply won't do.
option.name: will_not_do

option.line: A man dissolves in the absence of God.
option.name: dissolves

option.line: Did they eat Meryl Streep?
option.name: eat_streep

option.line: The world got full of zombies.
option.name: full_zombies

option.line: I think I walked out of the cinema on that one. Don't ask me why.
option.name: walked_out

option.line: And about time too.
option.name: about_time

option.line: Mother.
option.name: mother

option.line: My wife tends to scratch me when it's a full moon.
option.name: scratch

option.line: Wet dreams at your age.
option.name: wet_dreams

option.line: I remember reading the book. All about a man getting old. His lungs couldn't keep up with his dick. Is that the same?
option.name: lungs_dick

option.line: They saved her to last.
option.name: save_last

option.line: She became their queen.
option.name: queen

option.line: They put her on slow roast stuffed wtih spicy aphrodisiacs.
option.name: aphrodisiacs

option.line: The stories of their lives laid out before them.
option.name: stories_laid_out

option.line: It's called the world of work, Jake. The world of work.
option.name: work_world

option.line: Everywhere except Istanbul. The cry of the mosques kept them at bay.
option.name: mosque_cry

option.line: Ambiguity can irritate if it doesn't soothe.
option.name: ambiguity

option.line: I sometimes do that so I can make up my own ending.
option.name: own_ending

option.line: In the beginning there was the end.
option.name: beginning_end

option.line: A fatal dose of real life finished the man off. He got married.
option.name: fatal_dose

option.line: Remorse for the lives he had taken.
option.name: remorse

option.line: He couldn't keep it up anymore.
option.name: keep_it_up

option.line: Uncanny.
option.name: uncanny

option.line: Once you've tasted your mother's milk there's no going back.
option.name: mothers_milk

option.line: Aliens cleansed the Earth of its carbonating parasites.
option.name: earth_cleanse

option.line: Jane sees no one. She says she cannot trust herself when the moon gets in her eyes.
option.name: moon_eyes

option.line: I make sure the curtains are fully drawn.
option.name: curtains_drawn

option.line: Really? Mine becomes as placid as a moon calf.
option.name: moon_calf

option.line: They get worse you know. Or at least more inappropriate.
option.name: inappropriate

option.line: I do it by the teaspoon these days. It's easier on the sheets.
option.name: teaspoon

option.line: And they just get sweeter and sweeter.
option.name: sweeter

option.line: You're getting a tad personal there, Jake.
option.name: tad_personal

option.line: Don't worry. My dick and me, we're divorced.
option.name: divorced_dick

option.line: Sex is the absence made manifest.
option.name: absence_manifest

cut.speaker: Jake
cut.line: That never happened in any movie that I know.
cut.name: never_happened

option.line: Fortunately.
option.name: fortunately

option.line: Unfortunately.
option.name: unfortunately

cut.speaker: Jake
cut.line: You should try and stay awake tonight though. There's a very late film that's most unusual.
cut.name: most_unusual

option.line: It has no women in it.
option.name: no_women

option.line: It has only women in it.
option.name: only_women

option.line: It actually makes you want to get married.
option.name: want_marriage

option.line: No one really knows what it means. It is that good.
option.name: what_it_means

option.line: It's created it's own formula. The cunning bitch.
option.name: cunning

option.line: It has neither beginning nor end yet it somehow begins and somehow ends.
option.name: somehow_ends

option.line: It starts at the end and works itself back to the start.
option.name: back_to_start

option.line: Then it simply must be seen.
option.name: must_see

option.line: That's hardly a recommendation.
option.name: recommendation

option.line: Speak for yourself.
option.name: speak_yourself

option.line: Absolutely, my friend.
option.name: absolutely

cut.speaker: Jake
cut.line: Jane has a different slant on film.
cut.name: slant

cut.speaker: John
cut.line: Probably because she used to work in film.
cut.name: work_in_film

default.name: actress
default.line: As an actress, once or twice.

option.line: A prostitute dectective.
option.name: detective

option.line: A woman who gives heartbreak to all including herself.
option.name: heartbreak

option.line: A lipstick Medea with poison in her fingernails.
option.name: medea

option.line: A female messiah.
option.name: messiah

option.line: A suicide bomber.
option.name: bomber

option.line: A vampire seductress and virgin.
option.name: vampire

option.line: A lesbian consort to Valentino.
option.name: consort

default.line: An auteur of the moving image.
default.name: auteur

option.line: She poured oil over her naked body. Protest pornography she calls it.
option.name: protest_porno

option.line: She filmed the natural death of birds.
option.name: bird_death

option.line: She filmed landscapes and called them her lightscapes.
option.name: lightscapes

option.line: She filmed the faces of those who watch TV and their deadening boredom.
option.name: deadening_boredom

option.line: She did some time-lapse photography on a decaying body of a beautiful model.
option.name: decaying_body

default.line: A director of sorts.
default.name: director

option.line: Her methods were legendary. Each day was determined by the turn of a Tarot card.
option.name: tarot

option.line: She could humiliate an actor in 9.3 seconds.
option.name: humiliate

option.line: She insisted on real sex between the actors.
option.name: real_sex

option.line: For her bullet wounds meant sexual possibilities.
option.name: bullet_wounds

option.line: Her work is known for its quiet and excessive savagery.
option.name: savagery

option.line: Her characters suffered from a simultaneous implosion of meaning.
option.name: implosion

default.line: A film editor to be precise.
default.name: editor

option.line: It made her cry. All those other stories she murdered with her bare hands.
option.name: murdered_stories

option.line: She slashed women to pieces and she hated it.
option.name: slashed_women

option.line: Her signature was the single frame of a penis she put in all her best work.
option.name: signature

option.line: Until she wrote a computer programme that did it all for her.
option.name: computer_programme

option.line: Her hynotic rhythms wll either put you in a trance or made you have a fit.
option.name: hynotic_rhythms

option.line: Her favourite trick was using black and white frames, silence and white noise.
option.name: white_noise

section.summary: Jake's wife tells him bedtime stories under certain circumstances.

cut.speaker: John
cut.line: What did you do last night?
cut.name: last_night

cut.speaker: Jake
cut.line: My wife told me a story.
cut.name: wife_story

option.line: Bedtime stories. Practice for when we have a child.
option.name: bedtime_stories

option.line: She does that. And I lay my head in her lap.
option.name: lap

option.line: Only when it's a full moon.
option.name: full_moon

option.line: Only on the first night she bleeds.
option.name: bleeds

option.line: Only when I'm a good boy.
option.name: good_boy

option.line: Only when she is drunk.
option.name: when_drunk

option.line: Only when I can't sleep.
option.name: cannot_sleep

option.line: Only after she comes.
option.name: she_comes

option.line: Only on the anniversary of her father's death.
option.name: anniversary

cut.speaker: John
cut.line: My wife never tells me stories.
cut.name: never_stories

option.line: Nothing ever happens in her life.
option.name: nothing_ever

option.line: We operate through a sign language of sorts.
option.name: sign_language

option.line: Except where I'm the clumsy villain.
option.name: villain

option.line: Except for the old ones.
option.name: old_ones

option.line: Apart from you.
option.name: apart_from

option.line: Jane sometimes never speaks. She just is.
option.name: just_is

option.line: You always said she had an inventive turn of mind.
option.name: inventive_mind

option.line: And you try to listen as if it's the first time.
option.name: first_time

cut.speaker: Jake
cut.line: Only my wife couldn't finish her story.
cut.name: not_finish

default.line: Because it wasn't a full moon last night.
default.name: not_full

option.line: Who knows about the moon anyway?
option.name: moon_anyway

option.line: Her mind only swims in moonlight.
option.name: moonlight_swim

option.line: Her stories are born in the cradle of only the purest lunacy.
option.name: purest_lunacy

default.line: Because it was just pink water last night.
default.name: pink_water

option.line: The sanitary towel rustled between her legs all night.
option.name: rustled

option.line: I woke up to the smell of blood.
option.name: blood_smell

option.line: Her stories are there only to heal her wound.
option.name: heal_wound

default.line: Because I farted in bed last night.
default.name: bed_fart

option.line: The unspoken conjugal right of a husband, I feel.
option.name: conjugal_right

option.line: And she won't touch me all night for it.
option.name: touch_me

option.line: Its particular aroma reminded her of her father.
option.name: aroma

default.line: Last night she threw up half way through.
default.name: threw_up

option.line: And guess who cleaned it up.
option.name: cleaned_up

option.line: She made up for it in the morning though.
option.name: made_up

option.line: Maybe the alcohol or just an ending she wanted to avoid.
option.name: alcohol_ending

default.line: Last night she managed she sent herself to sleep.
default.name: send_herself

option.line: I felt she had abandoned me.
option.name: abandoned

option.line: I like to hear her sleep. It is my lullaby.
option.name: lullaby

option.line: When I tried to wake her up, she bit me.
option.name: bit_me

default.line: Last night she had a sexual aftershock.
default.name: aftershock

option.line: God, aren't women weird.
option.name: women_weird

option.line: Aren't women incredibly lucky?
option.name: incredibly_lucky

option.line: So she had to start again from scratch.
option.name: scratch_start

default.line: Last night she suddenly remembered what he was really like.
default.name: suddenly_remembered

option.line: Words and disappointment do not mix.
option.name: words_disappointment

option.line: His smile still haunts her.
option.name: smile_haunt

option.line: Then she looked at me, sighed and went straight to sleep.
option.name: sighed_slept

section.summary: Jake describes the kind of bedtime stories his wife tells him.

cut.speaker: John
cut.line: What kind of stories will your wife tell you?
cut.name: story_kind

default.line: She likes to castrate the prince.
default.name: castrate

option.line: The princess does it. With her teeth.
option.name: princess_teeth

option.line: His mother usually ends up doing it while he's asleep.
option.name: mother_asleep

option.line: His father does it out of jealousy. He wants the princess for himself.
option.name: father_jealousy

option.line: He does it to himself when he hears the princess is with another.
option.name: does_himself

option.line: Before she says he changes into the beast.
option.name: beast

default.line: Fairytales that get rather rude.
default.name: rude_fairytales

option.line: The princess doesn't just prick her finger.
option.name: prick_finger

option.line: For my wife the world of magic is opened with sex.
option.name: magic_sex

option.line: In narrative her sexuality has no limits.
option.name: no_limits

default.line: About betrayal and forgiveness mostly.
default.name: betrayal

option.line: The woman betrays and the man forgives.
option.name: man_forgives

option.line: The man betrays and the woman forgives.
option.name: woman_forgives

option.line: Her stories are always about redemption through pain.
option.name: redemption_pain

default.line: They always end happily ever after.
default.name: ever_after

option.line: We both like to believe in happy endings. For ourselves most of all.
option.name: believe_endings

option.line: The lovers, that is. They deny their own fears in the presence of the other.
option.name: deny_fears

option.line: The lovers, that is. They affirm their own existence in the presence of the other.
option.name: affirm_existence

option.line: Happy endings are fiction's greatest invention.
option.name: greatest_fiction

default.line: They send me sweetly to sleep. Why should I care?
default.name: sweetly_asleep

option.line: They lubricate my dreams with innocence.
option.name: lubricate_dreams

option.line: Such stories are for children. What is she trying to tell me?
option.name: children_stories

option.line: I just close my eyes and think of mother.
option.name: mother_think

default.line: It's the prince who gets rescued for her.
default.name: prince_resuced

option.line: From a life in which he does not need to acheive.
option.name: no_need_acheive

option.line: From the spell his mother put him in.
option.name: spell

option.line: By an Amazon queen so she can take his seed.
option.name: amazon_queen

option.line: When we briefly became the person we could be for the person we could never have.
option.name: briefly_became

option.line: When love was sweet and Jane most absent.
option.name: jane_absent

option.line: When your wife was a world of new possibilities.
option.name: new_world

option.line: I should've done her once or twice and left it at that.
option.name: once_twice

option.line: Before you end up hating the fact that you love her so much.
option.name: hating_love

option.line: When we saw ourselves as angels and believed it was really us.
option.name: angels_us

option.line: When what was sweet is now just grotesque.
option.name: grotesque

option.line: When she had a perfect arse.
option.name: perfect_arse

option.line: Tragic, I tell you. Tragic.
option.name: tragic

option.line: Sad or what?
option.name: sad_or

option.line: How completely idiotic.
option.name: idiotic

option.line: We found a solution to that. We became mutual parasites. That way if one of you leaves, you both die.
option.name: mutual_parasites

option.line: I remember first thinking about Jane when I was three.
option.name: when_three

option.line: Not a prison of old ones.
option.name: old_prison

option.line: Sexual convenience comes at a price.
option.name: convenience

option.line: Or loving the fact that you hate her so much.
option.name: love_hate

option.line: Marriage is an act of faith, the hardest of spirtual disciplines.
option.name: spritual_discipline

option.line: We can forgive a pretty face almost anything.
option.name: pretty_face

option.line: A decent pair of buttocks are not hard to find, John.
option.name: buttocks

option.line: Meet the mother. If you can imagine doing it with her, you're made for life.
option.name: meet_mother

section.summary: They talk about the kind of stories that Jane tells.

option.line: Jane. Her fantasy is quite extraordinary.
option.name: extraordinary

option.line: Jane. Her fantasy is hard to duplicate.
option.name: duplicate

option.line: Jane. Her fantasy begins on the edge of terror.
option.name: terror_edge

option.line: There's no one like Jane.
option.name: none_like

option.line: There's a bit of Jane in all of us.
option.name: in_all

option.line: Her stories never really end. You know, in a tidy little knot at the end.
option.name: tidy_knot

option.line: They contradict themselves like dreams.
option.name: contradict

option.line: The most innocent and the most cruel.
option.name: most_cruel

option.line: They round and round in circles. Like we all do.
option.name: in_circles

option.line: They splinter like remote controlled TV.
option.name: splinter

option.line: She has no need of stories herself. She creates them wherever she goes.
option.name: no_story_need

option.line: Greek myths meet science fiction. Men as the heroic and redundant species.
option.name: redundant

option.line: Her storybook is her own version of history.
option.name: storybook

option.line: Her eyes get glazed over. Their focus not even within but totally elsewhere.
option.name: elsewhere

option.line: Her eyes get glazed over. Fixed like a totem. Commanding and indifferent.
option.name: commanding

option.line: Her eyes get glazed over as she sees all the stories at once.
option.name: all_stories

option.line: Her eyes get glazed over. A self-inflicted wound she cures with language.
option.name: wound

option.line: Her eyes get glazed over and her pupils shrink to a full stop.
option.name: full_stop

option.line: Her eyes get glazed over and you vanish in the impersonal stare.
option.name: impersonal_stare

option.line: Her eyes get glazed over when the narrative narcotic kicks in.
option.name: kicks_in

option.line: I get mesmerised by the movement of her lips.
option.name: lip_movement

option.line: I get mesmerised by the cadence falling from her lips.
option.name: cadence

option.line: Her voice is the sound of a litany.
option.name: litany

option.line: Her voice is how a woman should really sound.
option.name: should_sound

option.line: But her kiss is cold like Judas.
option.name: judas

option.line: And her kiss haunts you. Like ecstasy.
option.name: ecstasy

option.line: Red waves undulating over vowels. Teeth biting on consonants.
option.name: undulating

option.line: I forget what she is saying and yet I understand.
option.name: forget_understand

option.line: The only thing language can do is surrender.
option.name: surrender

option.line: And she can scream like a Banshee.
option.name: banshee

option.line: Amen. And when you respond you respond on behalf of all men.
option.name: amen

option.line: A voice you and close to eyes to and listen.
option.name: listen_closed

option.line: A mother talking beautifully to her child.
option.name: mother_talking

option.line: And she sleeps with her eyes wide open.
option.name: wide_open

option.line: A delicious kiss that bends you into submission.
option.name: delicious_kiss

option.line: And you whole life beomes a kind of purgatory towards another moment like that.
option.name: purgatory

option.line: But her affections are quite the carnivore. They feed on your worship.
option.name: carnivore

option.line: No, it's her hands. When she touches me I get so happy inside.
option.name: happy_hands

option.line: No, it's her hands. Those graceful ambassadors to her state.
option.name: ambassadors

option.line: I remember all that she said and yet I never understand.
option.name: remember_misunderstand

option.line: Sometimes I wish I could forget some of the things she has said.
option.name: wish_forget

option.line: Sometimes it falls like sweet rain, sometimes like a plague of curses.
option.name: sweet_rain

option.line: And then take no prisoners.
option.name: no_prisoners

section.summary: John talks about the dream life he would like to lead.

cut.speaker: Jake
cut.line: What is your fantasy? The thing you dream about when your eyes are wide open?
cut.name: fantasy_mtl

option.line: That my wife will stop threatening me.
option.name: threatening me

option.line: That my wife will stop controlling me.
option.name: controlling me

option.line: That my wife will stop ordering me about.
option.name: ordering me

option.line: That my wife will stop hitting me.
option.name: hitting me

option.line: That my wife will stop complaining.
option.name: complaining

option.line: That my wife will stop disrespecting me in front of others.
option.name: disrespecting me

option.line: That my wife will stop having sex with me.
option.name: having sex with me

option.line: Hardly a productive way to lead your life.
option.name: hardly productive

option.line: Womankind are womancruel in my opinion.
option.name: womancruel

option.line: I even like it to a degree. But enough is a fluid concept.
option.name: fluid concept

option.line: That's not what I asked. It's a call for help.
option.name: call for help

option.line: That's not what I asked. It's all domestic frustration.
option.name: domestic frustration

option.line: That's not what I asked. It's just you waking up to the smell of your own stagnation.
option.name: stagnation

option.line: That's not what I asked. It's just the knee jerk reaction of someone who's been married for too long.
option.name: knee jerk reaction

option.line: Oh. I always wanted to be a poet.
option.name: poet

option.line: Oh. I always wanted to be an actor.
option.name: actor

option.line: Oh. I always wanted to be a politician.
option.name: politician

option.line: Oh. I always wanted to be a philosopher.
option.name: philosopher

option.line: Oh. I always wanted to be a pop star.
option.name: pop star

option.line: Oh. I always wanted to be an artist.
option.name: artist

option.line: Oh. I always wanted to be a genius.
option.name: genius

option.line: Oh. I always wanted to be a director.
option.name: director

option.line: That's better.
option.name: better

option.line: Aren't they a bit overrated?
option.name: overrated

option.line: Then I'd have something to say.
option.name: something to say

option.line: My wife might fall in love with me again.
option.name: fall in love again

option.line: Jane would not be impressed. She would see right through it.
option.name: not be impressed

option.line: To be a name on other people's lips.
option.name: to be a name

option.line: Cheat death and be a part of history.
option.name: cheat death

option.line: I would sleep with so many women, Jane would get jealous.
option.name: jealous Jane

option.line: I would sleep with so many women, Jane would dissipate into thin air.
option.name: dissipating Jane

option.line: I would sleep with so many women, my wife will have to book an appointment to see my dick again.
option.name: book an appointment

section.summary: John has an argument with his wife.

cut.speaker: Jake
cut.line: Is your wife still doing it?
cut.name: still doing it

option.line: I forgot to put the toilet seat down. It drives her wild.
option.name: toilet seat

option.line: Jill thinks I'm having an affair.
option.name: thinks affair

option.line: I told her I didn't want to sleep with her anymore.
option.name: not sleep with her

option.line: She's a woman and a lunatic, that's why.
option.name: lunatic

option.line: Jill thought she found one of my pubic hairs in the butter.
option.name: pubic hair

option.line: Jill has low self-esteem. Attacking someone helps.
option.name: low self-esteem

option.line: She's got to do something to fill the childless vacuum.
